sentences.sContent: His proposals have already been rebuffed by the governor.
sentences.sCn: 他的建议已被州长拒绝了。

synos.tran: 断然拒绝；回绝；漠不关心

remMethod.val: re (反) + buff ( = puff， 喷； 吹) → 反过来喷气 → 回绝

trans.tranOther: If you rebuff someone or rebuff a suggestion that they make, you refuse to do what they suggest
